name: MURDER! (mystery) at the Hell Hotel
description:
Flirt your way through three suspects and convince Satan you belong in Heaven!

You arrive in Hell to find... Wait a second, you're not supposed to be here! Now you've made a deal with Satan: if you can solve this murder mystery, he'll let you into Heaven!

Find out the truth about what happened when Walter, Larry, and Wanda were on Earth. Walter is timid and easily scared. Larry is nice and seems honest enough. Wanda... Damn, what a sexy bitch.

But who killed them? And... why?

Features

  • Interrogate and flirt with 3 unique suspects/victims
  • Click on objects in the room to investigate and ask about them
  • Piece together clues using a journal that tracks your discoveries
  • Revisit characters after finding new clues to catch them in lies
